const recomendations = {
  Underweight: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. </br>
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!`,
  Healthy: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!
    `,
  Overweight: ["The body mass index (BMI) is a measure that uses your height and weight to work out if your weight is healthy. The BMI calculation divides an adult's weight in kilograms by their height in metres squared. For example, A BMI of 25 means 25kg/m2.", "Hopefully everything works out for you!", "Have a beautiful day!"],
  Obese: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!
    `
};
export default recomendations;

sourcesContent:
const recomendations = {
    Underweight: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. </br>
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!`,
    Healthy: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!
    `,
    Overweight: [
    "The body mass index (BMI) is a measure that uses your height and weight to work out if your weight is healthy. The BMI calculation divides an adult's weight in kilograms by their height in metres squared. For example, A BMI of 25 means 25kg/m2.",
    "Hopefully everything works out for you!",
    "Have a beautiful day!"
    ],
    Obese: `
    This is text for the underweight section of the recomendations page. \n
    Hopefully everything works out for you!
    Have a beautiful day!
    `
}

export default recomendations;
